title: Heartbroken family of Greek heiress who died after being bitten by an insect threaten legal action against hospitals over 'doctor's negligence'
description: Marissa Laimou, 30, was found dead in her bed by a housekeeper at the townhouse she lived in with her parents in Knightsbridge, central London, on September 11.
